name: Quarkbucks Cafe
description:
Quarkbucks is a small café which sells drinks containing a special ingredient: syrups made with radioactive elements!

Control 4 robot workers who make and serve coffee, tea, hot chocolate and bubble tea using the process of radioactive decay. Make sure you clean the kitchen of alpha and beta particles, and don't let the customers wait too long or waste too much product.

Warning: in the current build, score and lives do not reset upon exiting to the main menu. Restart the game if you want to play again.
